page.title: Accessing Redis on another host
page.description: Example of accessing remote redis instance.

section.example:
dim redisLocal as extension::RedisClient = extension::RedisClient::CreateClient() redisLocal.Set("test","Local, not remote") ? redisLocal.get("test").valueString = "Local, not remote"
dim redis as extension::RedisClient = extension::RedisClient::CreateClient("192.168.254.28") redis.Set("test","Hello world")
? redis.get("test").valueString = "Hello world"
? redisLocal.get("test").valueString = "Local, not remote"
